title: LF players to play trollish games with
body: I'm looking for people to play normal games with me, but not just normal normal games, i mean to play things that are out of the meta, never seen in the meta, or just plain stupid. i honestly don't care what rank you are, if you want to have fun in some norms, comment or just add me (RMC Grotato)

replies.body: I'm friends with another guy and we break meta regularly. I can do Xerath in all roles, even jg and ADC, but I need practice on last hitting in the top and bottom lanes. It's not easy to freeze waves compared to mid and support doesn't even control the wave at all.

I don't care if you cant play good, or have extremely low win rates, i just want to have a team that wont judge you for play full ap Shen or ap Garen (ap is useless but i still do it), if you want to be able to play like that then just add me.
i appreciate that you're trying to look for people who share your mindset. i only hope everyone of you become your own teams to play against the rest of us

I didn't say I was _bad_, I have 49% winrate on Xerath... Which isn't that low, right?

I'll try to remember adding you, but it's not necessary to state your IGN in the post since the boards username is always the same as the one in the actual game.
I was never intending on calling you bad, i was merely stating that i wouldnt care if you were. and regarding the name. This is a game, kids play it, and some people dont exactly see the obvious.
